website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you need a portable model that produces serious ice output, as it is capable of making almost double the amount of others in its class.
pros: Portable and able to make up to 48 lbs
of ice per day, which makes it ideal for large get-togethers
cons: Slightly noisy when it's producing ice

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!!  Real workhorse!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine for my office. We have 22 people in my office and this machine keeps up with the demand!! The ice is bullet shaped and we have it set for the medium sized ice cube. Last a long time (I even refill my water before the ice melts). I never turn off the machine. My office has power surges once in a while, but the machine powers itself off and only resets after I unplug it from the wall. Great safety feature so it doesn't burn up the motor.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: but unfortunately due to poor packaging and obviously poor handling the ice maker came ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the ice maker, plugged it in and it staring working.... then turned off, then turned on.... then turned off. All without me touching a button. It started making ice and then stopped mid freeze. The machine had a small separation on the side. Called the manufacturer, waited on hold for 35 minutes, but finally got connected. They sent a replacement ice maker, but unfortunately due to poor packaging and obviously poor handling the ice maker came with a large dent in the corner and won't even start. I'm now waiting for them to decide what to do. I have sent pictures of the machines. Haven't heard back yet. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Spikesmom

customer_reviews.title: The best ice maker we have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The best ice maker we have ever owned. This machine is larger than most. The ice is not stop. Automatic cleaner is the best part. We hope this machine will a long time.
customer_reviews.author: cvmajors

customer_reviews.title: You can have it make ice for 18 hours and then have to manually reprogram everytime and the control board is not user friendly nor easy to engage
customer_reviews.text: This item is such a pain because you cannot program it for repetition. You can have it make ice for 18 hours and then have to manually reprogram everytime and the control board is not user friendly nor easy to engage. it makes great ice but we never use it now cause setting up just takes too long. Wish they would have an automated setting
customer_reviews.author: MATGARO

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about it (even though the first one sent ...
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it (even though the first one sent to me was defective the people at the amazon end were very helpful not so much the people at the place it was sent from (compact appliance) very short on the phone when I mentioned I ordered thru amazon)... only thing not happy with is the weight of the unit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would have been better off to put more money into a commercial grade ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one we've had. I use it a lot on weekends; we have a big family. You constantly have to tend it and restart it as it cuts off on it's own all the time; without being on the timer. Would have been better off to put more money into a commercial grade one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It arrived and the compressor did not work. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and the compressor did not work. It's such a hassle to repack and ship back so I decided to pull the cover off the motor to see if it was a simple fix. After a few minutes of looking, I noticed a wire hanging free. I located the connection point, plugged it in and it started running. Maybe it came loose during the shipping process. It works well and produces lots of ice. I would have given it a 5 star if it arrived in working order.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel K.

customer_reviews.title: Lack of customer service for a defective product
customer_reviews.text: Has not worked from the first day it arrived. Tried emailing the manufacturer as per amazon instructions and have not heard from them in over 3 or 4 weeks now. Will not buy their products again and will discourage as many potential buyers as possible. Customer service is horrible and non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Veazey

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had purchased the protection plan with this even though I never buy protection plans. It worked well for just under 1 year then failed. Other than that it supplied a substantial amount of ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: OtisPaul

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Ice Maker
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I purchased this unit to replace my old EdgeStar ice maker (IP210SS) which was smaller. Have used it at a few family gatherings now and I am very satisfied with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C. Burger

customer_reviews.title: Good Ice Maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little machine. The only thing that could make it better would be if the ice bin could keep the ice frozen. It must be transferred to the freezer immediately or starts melting. For the price though one cannot expect the addition of a freezer section. We are extremely pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ice maker. We have had it now for two summers. Easy to use and makes plenty of ice for large parties. Although, its too large and heavy to bring camping. Thinking about getting a smaller one for the camper.
customer_reviews.author: koop320

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Makes ice fast and continuous. Very easy to use. Has 3 different sizes of cubes to choose from and is simple to change accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Rickie

customer_reviews.title: Bad!
customer_reviews.text: Right after we took it out of the box we followed instructions on how to get it started. We poured water in to begin making ice and all the water came out the bottom of the machine onto the floor. We packed it right back up and sent it back:(
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective.  Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived defective and did not work from day 1 it arrived. Returned it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Quality built icemaker!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Great quality, easy to use, and makes very nice ice quickly! I also like the cleaning feature.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: Cranks out the ice!
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker really cranks out the ice! I purchased this 2 months ago and my only regret is that I didn't purchase it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: It’s very easy to use and makes ice quickly.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to use and if you’re in the middle of making ice and you have to run out to the store etc. you don’t have to worry about leaving the ice maker on. When the cycle is finished and it shuts down and the ice starts melting it will turn back on and remake ice from the water that has melted from the try of ice that had been already made.
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: The machine leaked from the bottom and required an immediate ...
customer_reviews.text: The machine leaked from the bottom and required an immediate service. The machin now works as it should with out leaking, but I'm concerned about future problems.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I have made. Love my ice maker.!
customer_reviews.text: Best appliance made. I have tried a couple of other portable ice maker but edgestar is by far the best. Makes ice quickly.
customer_reviews.author: donna b dorton

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best ice machine we have had. This is our 3rd one and so far it is the hk
customer_reviews.author: virginia

customer_reviews.title: No Issues!
customer_reviews.text: Looked for awhile and decided to try this unit out. We use it at #ourkeyslife and it has been great. Works fantastically! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Brian OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product it is making ice as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Big Mac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Read all direction. Let’s set upright 24 hours before using. Awesome I’ve maker!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Liked it when it worked for those 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Died after 2 weeks. Company is not responsive when requesting to replace or return the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Denice

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ice maker was defective had to return did not reorder
customer_reviews.author: Charleen Yarborough

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I received item with screws falling out of box it still worked, but keeps freezing up. Returned it and am still with out item I purchached. Being left high and dry from Amazon and EdgeStar. Not happy with either one about customer service it is not very helpful to replace said Item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Great ice maker. Not too noisy and makes consistently sized cubes in each size choice. Use it daily - it doesn't get to rest.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Capacity is large and we love it.
customer_reviews.text: Fast ice maker. Capacity is large and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Machine would not work. Had to send it back ...
customer_reviews.text: Machine would not work. Had to send it back. Would only make one round of ice and then shut itself off.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Love my Edgestar ice machine
customer_reviews.text: Product came very quickly and was perfect for a very large (80+people) 4th of July party.. It continued to make ice all day and it was in the high 80s so lots of ice was needed.... Love love love this product and it looks great in our bar!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A quality ice maker compared to other counter top units. Larger cubes in shorter time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This ice machine is the best! Never run out of ice!
customer_reviews.author: PAM HANZLIK

customer_reviews.title: This Ice Machine Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Have had it several months now and we love it!. No problems at all and we use it constantly. Nothing more to say. Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Halbritter

customer_reviews.title: Edgewater icemaker
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been great! Makes ice quickly so can never out!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia l. briley

customer_reviews.title: Big heavy junk
customer_reviews.text: Not good! Began acting up soon after purchase. In the garbage pile now.
customer_reviews.author: E B

customer_reviews.title: ... now have two of these machines and they are great, they can keep up with my family and ...
customer_reviews.text: I now have two of these machines and they are great, they can keep up with my family and that is saying a lot.
customer_reviews.author: deanna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this machine. Everything about it is fantastic. Works better than expected. Great machine great company
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: This ice maker works much better as faster than the other two
customer_reviews.text: I've had two other ice makers before . This ice maker works much better as faster than the other two. I really haven't had it long enough to read any kind of real dependability yet if it works as well as it's been working so far it's going to be a great machine and have absolutely no problem recommended this ice maker to anyone so far it's a real winner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a wonderful machine if the workmanship was good
customer_reviews.text: Irate it a 4 because it does produce ice as stated. However the workmanship is shoddy. The left side panel was almost coning off when we rec'd it. We decided to try it and we would fix the side. Which we did. It is a wonderful machine if the workmanship was good.
customer_reviews.author: Ina Nunnery

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product, I wish it could automatically fill with ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product, I wish it could automatically fill with water the tank, plus good ice begins after reaching a cool level in the water, approximately 3 times after pouring the ice, some minor details but after it is working good.
customer_reviews.author: rviu

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if the lid were angled a little farther tpwrad ...
customer_reviews.text: Slightly noisy but makes a lot of ice. The lid falls down whine is open to remove ice. It would be nice if the lid were angled a little farther tpwrad the back of the machine so it would stay open without falling when you are removing ice from the bin
customer_reviews.author: Brian S

customer_reviews.title: this is a good ice-maker with the exception of the control panel
customer_reviews.text: As many reviews have said, this is a good ice-maker with the exception of the control panel. You really can't read it very easily.
customer_reviews.author: H Number

customer_reviews.title: The only draw back is the led reading panel is not as bright as to make it easily read.
customer_reviews.text: So far this ice maker has performed as indicated and I am very pleased with the output of ice. The only draw back is the led reading panel is not as bright as to make it easily read.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Lady

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for soft ice lovers
customer_reviews.text: My wife really likes the soft ice better than Sonic ice. She does wish that it actually produces different size ice as advertised, but is still very satisfied. That is the only reason for four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Stillkickin3

customer_reviews.title: ... how hard i tried i could not get the FOUL taste from the ice
customer_reviews.text: No matter how hard i tried i could not get the FOUL taste from the ice.
customer_reviews.author: monty tonnies

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice maker for those who love to chew ice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fridge! If you love to chew ice, this is the perfect ice maker. The ice comes out a little soft, perfect texture for chewing ice and not breaking your teeth, which is exactly what I wanted. Since the ice is soft, if you leave the ice in the ice maker basket, it will eventually melt again to water and remade into ice cubes. This is not an ice maker for those who want hard ice that will not melt fast in drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Ahearn

product_meta.title: EdgeStar Large Capacity Portable Stainless Steel Ice Maker
feature_bullets: Easy-to-use electronic controls; Produces ice in an average of 10 minutes; Stores up to 2.6 lbs. of ice at a time
Three (3) different ice cube sizes; Use tap or bottled water; No drain required
Commercial-grade stainless steel; Makes up to 48 pounds of ice per day
Durable, compact and portable, this attractive ice maker will more than meet your ice making needs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars86 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
